trans-unit.source: Represents a data source for a Dynamic Data control.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource"></xref> control dynamically creates a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> clause based on values defined in the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource.WhereParameters*> collection.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source control creates the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> clause dynamically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the type of the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"></xref> class.
The type associated with the class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source view supports the ability to delete rows.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source view supports the ability to delete rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source view supports the ability to insert rows.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source view supports the ability to insert rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source view supports the ability to update rows.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the view supports the ability to update rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the entity set name.
In the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> class, this property is called `TableName`.
The name of the entity.
Occurs when a data field fails to validate.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the condition that must be true for a record to be included in the retrieved data by a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> clause.
The specific syntax for the `Where` clause depends on the data source that is used.
The value that is used to create the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> clause.
Gets a collection of parameters that are used to create a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> clause.
A collection that contains the parameters that are used by this property.
